website_summaries.verdict: High top version of traditional favorite. Same great colors and canvas in a high top that protects the ankle.
pros: Great retro look in a brightly-colored shoe
Cleans well in the washing machine
Stays on better than the low rise version
cons: Design makes shoe slightly longer than normal

customer_reviews.title: Classic Converse
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves these shoes. He abandoned all his other shoes once he got these.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Always a classic!!
customer_reviews.text: Son loves them, had to put them on ASAP! Now he just has to learn to tie. What an incentive. :)
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: My niece was very happy with her shoes. They fit her a little big but that's because we got them for her a size big cause she's growing by the minute.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Got it when promised They fit perfect. Sixes run a bit larger which is good ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it when promised They fit perfect. Sixes run a bit larger which is good they can grow into them
customer_reviews.author: texsun1980

customer_reviews.title: Like father, like son
customer_reviews.text: We went to the store to verify size because they didn't have red hi-tops, then I bought them on here. Son loves them. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Chrazyman

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very cute high tops!!!! My daughter loved them. They fit really well. They're little challenging to put on, but the fit is really good once they're on.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: buy them every year..love them for summer..and clean well!! love it..cheap and great for kids that are harsh on shoes..
customer_reviews.author: Noey

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: there is no arch support so just don't wear them every day :O)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great addition!
customer_reviews.text: My kid is in heaven with these new kicks! He wears them with every outfit. They look great on him too. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Alreca Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters loves her new shoes! They fit great! True to size!
customer_reviews.author: Eilish C.

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my 6 year old great-niece. She was thrilled! Great product, exactly as pictured. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Switzer

customer_reviews.title: great quality. I just love them
customer_reviews.text: The color and size were as expected, the package arrived on time, great quality. I just love them!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Rojas Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes with a little room to grow into them.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: 7 y/o loves them
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in the expected condition, new and clean. The shoes fit my 7 year old just right, not too small but with enough room to grow a bit. She loves them wears them to school almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: Reggae lover

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my grandson and he told me ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson and he told me that can run faster. So with that being said I give them 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Michael R Roth

customer_reviews.title: I love the red color
customer_reviews.text: Chucks are the only shoes my Grandson wears. I love the red color! They fit well and wear well.
customer_reviews.author: Martha L Bainer

product_meta.title: Converse Kids' 3j232-t
product_meta.description: Converse Toddler/Youth Chuck Taylor All Star Hi Top - Red Converse run 1/2 size large. It is recommended to order down accordingly. Durable Product.
